name: EndotrachealIntubation
title: Endotracheal Intubation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent procedures used to define endotracheal intubation.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who received endotracheal intubation as a medical procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes that describe the insertion of an endotracheal airway (intubation) into the trachea.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that describe intubation via tracheotomy or cricothyrotomy.)

concept.display: Ventilation assist and management, initiation of pressure or volume preset ventilators for assisted or controlled breathing; hospital inpatient/observation, initial day
Ventilation assist and management, initiation of pressure or volume preset ventilators for assisted or controlled breathing; hospital inpatient/observation, each subsequent day
